camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.topic.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.topic.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.bootstrapServer.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.bootstrapServer.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslAuthType.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslAuthType
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslAuthType.description: Authentication type to use. Use NONE for no authentication, PLAIN or SCRAM_SHA_256/SCRAM_SHA_512 for username/password, SSL for certificate-based, OAUTH for OAuth 2.0, AWS_MSK_IAM for MSK, or KERBEROS for Kerberos.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslUsername.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslUsername
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslUsername.description: Username for SASL authentication. Required when saslAuthType is PLAIN, SCRAM_SHA_256, or SCRAM_SHA_512.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslPassword.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslPassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.saslPassword.description: Password for SASL authentication. Required when saslAuthType is PLAIN, SCRAM_SHA_256, or SCRAM_SHA_512.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientId.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientId
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientId.description: OAuth client ID. Required when saslAuthType is OAUTH.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientSecr.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientSecret
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthClientSecr.description: OAuth client secret. Required when saslAuthType is OAUTH.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthTokenEndpo.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthTokenEndpointUri
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthTokenEndpo.description: OAuth token endpoint URI. Required when saslAuthType is OAUTH.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthScope.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthScope
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.oauthScope.description: OAuth scope. Optional when saslAuthType is OAUTH.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststoreLo.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststoreLocation
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststoreLo.description: The location of the trust store file.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststorePa.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststorePassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslTruststorePa.description: The password for the trust store file.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystoreLoca.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystoreLocation
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystoreLoca.description: The location of the key store file. Used for mTLS authentication.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystorePass.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystorePassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeystorePass.description: The password for the key store file.

camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeyPassword.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeyPassword
camel.kamelet.kafka-sink.sslKeyPassword.description: The password of the private key in the key store file.
